description.raw:
`team.launch` no longer launches the world so any environment can be selected.

**Now the world must be loaded before the team is spawned.**

‌

Example:

First, launch the world

`roslaunch subt_gazebo competition.launch scenario:=cave`

Then,

`roslaunch subt_example team.launch`

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1858019844-entrance.jpg)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1641955330-after_entrance.jpg)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1502076247-another.jpg)
‌

And a small update: Iris control is improved so it can more smoothly move.
description.html:
team.launch no longer launches the world so any environment can be selected.

Now the world must be loaded before the team is spawned.

‌

Example:

And a small update: Iris control is improved so it can more smoothly move.
